ForceAllMeshAsType: If set, imports all meshes in the source as either static meshes or skeletal meshes.
bAutoDetectMeshType:
If enabled, and some static mesh transforms are animated, the pipeline will convert the static mesh into a rigid skeletal mesh.
This setting is only used if the Force All Meshes As Type setting is set to "None".
bImportLods: If enabled, any existing LODs for meshes are imported. This setting is only used if the Bake Meshes setting is also enabled.
bBakeMeshes: If enabled, meshes are baked with the scene instance hierarchy transform.
bKeepSectionsSeparate: If checked, sections with matching materials are kept separate and will not get combined.
VertexColorImportOption: Specify how vertex colors should be imported.
VertexOverrideColor: Specify an override color for use when the Vertex Color Import Option setting is set to Override.
bRecomputeNormals: If enabled, normals in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed.
bRecomputeTangents: If enabled, tangents in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed.
bUseMikkTSpace: If enabled, tangents are recomputed using MikkTSpace.
bComputeWeightedNormals: If enabled, normals are computed using the surface area and the corner angle of the triangle as a ratio.
bUseHighPrecisionTangentBasis: If true, tangents are stored at 16-bit vs 8-bit precision.
bUseFullPrecisionUVs: If true, UVs are stored at full floating-point precision.
bUseBackwardsCompatibleF16TruncUVs: If enabled, UVs are converted to 16-bit by a legacy truncation process instead of the default rounding process. This may avoid differences when reimporting older content.
bRemoveDegenerates: If true, degenerate triangles are removed.
